title: Stand Up, Sitting Down
description: The unconventional autobiography of Jimmy Perrin, covering parts of his life, extracts from his youth and a glimpse of his mannerisms / beliefs. “This is not my autobiography, It's just a little bit of me talking rubbish, because I refuse to write my life story”This is Jimmy at his best, away from his usual characters, speaking openly about everything and anything. Whereas an autobiography will help you find a greater understanding of the person writing it, this book will just confuse you more" (Think you know Jimmy already? This will change your mind !!)
author: Jimmy Perrin
